BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 080159Z DEC
   BY M/V SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE TOWING
   200 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-15.42S 040-04.50W, 22-18.47S 039-53.40W,
   22-28.28S 039-55.50W, 22-20.35S 040-07.17W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 080259Z DEC 12.
